description: Eli Hunter"The Hammer"Ht: 5'7"Wt: 155lbsSeason W/L Record (2-2)Mitch Vaughn"The Machine"Ht: 5'10"Wt: 205lbsSeason W/L Record (3-1) Back on the mat is muscled hunk Mitch "The Machine" Vaughn facing off against the big dick stud, Eli "The Hammer" Hunter. The Hammer says he's been on a strict dieting and work out routine to prepare for this bout and as always keeping up on his endurance. The Machine may have more muscle, but Hammer just thinks he's a big meat head who's lost his way to the gym and he can't wait to waste his ass in all four rounds. Machine's response? He plans on bending Hammer over his knee and beating his ass red before ramming his cock up it and fucking him without mercy. One of these fighters will have to put their money where their mouth is by getting fucked from both ends before being showered with cum and piss.
title: Eli "The Hammer" Hunter vs Mitch "The Machine" Vaughn
